00042 ////!< readOn

00044 
00045 Entree& Perte_Charge_Singuliere_PolyMAC_Face::readOn(Entree& s)
00046 {
00047   Perte_Charge_Singuliere::lire_donnees(s);
00048   remplir_num_faces(s);
00049   if (regul_) //fichier de sortie si regulation
00050     {
00051       bilan().resize(3); //K deb cible
00052       set_fichier(Nom("K_") + identifiant_);
00053       set_description(Nom("Regulation du Ksing de la surface ") + identifiant_ + "\nt K deb cible");
00054     }
00055   return s;
00056 }

00066 
00067 void Perte_Charge_Singuliere_PolyMAC_Face::remplir_num_faces(Entree& s)
00068 {
00069   const Domaine& le_domaine = equation().probleme().domaine();
00070   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone_PolyMAC = ref_cast(Zone_PolyMAC,equation().zone_dis().valeur());
00071   int taille_bloc = zone_PolyMAC.nb_elem();
00072   num_faces.resize(taille_bloc);
00073   lire_surfaces(s,le_domaine,zone_PolyMAC,num_faces, sgn);
00074 // int nfac_tot = mp_sum(num_faces.size());
00075   int nfac_max = (int)mp_max(num_faces.size()); //!< not to count several (number of processes) times the same face
00076 
00077   if(je_suis_maitre() && nfac_max == 0)
00078     {
00079       Cerr << "Error when defining the surface plane for the singular porosity :" << finl;
00080       Cerr << "No mesh faces has been found for the surface plane." << finl;
00081       Cerr << "Check the coordinate of the surface plane which should match mesh coordinates." << finl;
00082       exit();
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 DoubleTab& Perte_Charge_Singuliere_PolyMAC_Face::ajouter(DoubleTab& resu) const
00087 {
00088   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone_PolyMAC = la_zone_PolyMAC.valeur();
00089 // const DoubleVect& volumes_entrelaces = zone_PolyMAC.volumes_entrelaces();
00090   const DoubleVect& p_f = zone_PolyMAC.porosite_face();
00091   const DoubleTab& vit = la_vitesse->valeurs();
00092 
00093   for (int i = 0, f; i < num_faces.size(); i++) if ((f = num_faces(i)) < zone_PolyMAC.nb_faces())
00094       {
00095         double Ud = vit(f) * p_f(f),
00096                surf = direction_perte_charge() < 0 ? zone_PolyMAC.face_surfaces(f) : dabs(zone_PolyMAC.face_normales(f,direction_perte_charge())); //!< Taking account of inclined plane
00097         resu(f) -= 0.5 * surf * p_f(f) * K() * Ud * dabs(Ud);
00098       }
00099   return resu;
00100 }
00101 
00102 DoubleTab& Perte_Charge_Singuliere_PolyMAC_Face::calculer(DoubleTab& resu) const
00103 {
00104   resu = 0;
00105   return ajouter(resu);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void Perte_Charge_Singuliere_PolyMAC_Face::contribuer_a_avec(const DoubleTab& inco, Matrice_Morse& matrice) const
00109 {
00110   const Zone_PolyMAC& zone_PolyMAC = la_zone_PolyMAC.valeur();
00111   const DoubleVect& p_f = zone_PolyMAC.porosite_face();
00112   const DoubleTab& vit = la_vitesse->valeurs();
00113 
00114   for (int i = 0, f; i < num_faces.size(); i++) if ((f = num_faces(i)) < zone_PolyMAC.nb_faces())
00115       {
00116         double Ud = vit(f) * p_f(f),
00117                surf = direction_perte_charge() < 0 ? zone_PolyMAC.face_surfaces(f) : dabs(zone_PolyMAC.face_normales(f,direction_perte_charge())); //!< Taking account of inclined plane
00118         matrice.coef(f, f) += surf * p_f(f) * K() * p_f(f) * dabs(Ud);
00119       }
00120 }
00121 
00122 void Perte_Charge_Singuliere_PolyMAC_Face::mettre_a_jour(double temps)
00123 {
00124   Perte_Charge_PolyMAC_Face::mettre_a_jour(temps);
00125   update_K(equation(), calculate_Q(equation(), num_faces, sgn), bilan());
00126 }
